price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߡߐ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߛߖߌ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐ߫ ، ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߴߊ߬ ߞߟߍ߬ߢߐ߲߰ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ ߘߌ߫ ߣߌ߲߬
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-insāna min nuṭ'fatin fa-idhā huwa khaṣīmun mubīnun
